segment.source: Support for SQL Server AlwaysOn availability groups
segment.target: Support for SQL Server AlwaysOn availability groups

segment.source: MBAM enables you to configure and manage availability groups for the databases in Microsoft SQL Server.
segment.target: MBAM enables you to configure and manage availability groups for the databases in Microsoft SQL Server.

segment.source: An availability group for MBAM supports a failover environment where the Compliance and Audit Database and the Recovery Database fail over together rather than separately.
segment.target: An availability group for MBAM supports a failover environment where the Compliance and Audit Database and the Recovery Database fail over together rather than separately.

segment.source: An availability group supports a set of read/write primary databases and one to four sets of corresponding secondary databases.
segment.target: An availability group supports a set of read/write primary databases and one to four sets of corresponding secondary databases.

segment.source: Optionally, secondary databases can be made available for read-only permission, some backup operations, or for both.
segment.target: Optionally, secondary databases can be made available for read-only permission, some backup operations, or for both.

segment.source: For information about how to set up availability groups, see AlwaysOn Availability Groups.
segment.target: For information about how to set up availability groups, see AlwaysOn Availability Groups.

segment.source: IIS Network Load Balancing
segment.target: IIS Network Load Balancing

segment.source: You can use Network Load Balancing to configure a highly available environment for computers that are running the Administration and Monitoring Website (also known as Help Desk), the Self-Service Portal, and the web services, which are deployed through Internet Information Services (IIS).
segment.target: You can use Network Load Balancing to configure a highly available environment for computers that are running the Administration and Monitoring Website (also known as Help Desk), the Self-Service Portal, and the web services, which are deployed through Internet Information Services (IIS).

segment.source: Database mirroring in SQL Server
segment.target: Database mirroring in SQL Server

segment.source: MBAM supports the use of SQL Server mirroring, where the Compliance and Audit Database and the Recovery Database are mirrored by using two instances of SQL Server for each database.
segment.target: MBAM supports the use of SQL Server mirroring, where the Compliance and Audit Database and the Recovery Database are mirrored by using two instances of SQL Server for each database.

segment.source: Before implementing mirroring, be aware that mirroring is slowly being phased out, in favor of availability groups, which are discussed earlier in this topic.
segment.target: Before implementing mirroring, be aware that mirroring is slowly being phased out, in favor of availability groups, which are discussed earlier in this topic.

segment.source: To implement mirroring for MBAM, you must specify the appropriate connection strings for the mirrored database configuration by using the Enable-MbamWebApplication Windows PowerShell cmdlet.
segment.target: To implement mirroring for MBAM, you must specify the appropriate connection strings for the mirrored database configuration by using the Enable-MbamWebApplication Windows PowerShell cmdlet.

segment.source: For more information about the MBAM 2.5 Windows PowerShell cmdlets, see Configuring MBAM 2.5 Server Features by Using Windows PowerShell.

segment.source: Backing up MBAM databases by using the Volume Shadow Copy Service (VSS)
segment.target: Backing up MBAM databases by using the Volume Shadow Copy Service (VSS)

segment.source: MBAM provides a Volume Shadow Copy Service (VSS) writer, called the Microsoft BitLocker Administration and Management Writer.
segment.target: MBAM provides a Volume Shadow Copy Service (VSS) writer, called the Microsoft BitLocker Administration and Management Writer.

segment.source: This VSS writer facilitates the backup of the Compliance and Audit Database and the Recovery Database.
segment.target: This VSS writer facilitates the backup of the Compliance and Audit Database and the Recovery Database.

segment.source: The VSS writer is registered on every server where you enable an MBAM web application.
segment.target: The VSS writer is registered on every server where you enable an MBAM web application.

segment.source: The MBAM VSS writer depends on the SQL Server VSS Writer, which is registered as part of the Microsoft SQL Server installation.
segment.target: The MBAM VSS writer depends on the SQL Server VSS Writer, which is registered as part of the Microsoft SQL Server installation.

segment.source: Any backup technology that uses VSS writers to perform backup can discover the MBAM VSS writer.
segment.target: Any backup technology that uses VSS writers to perform backup can discover the MBAM VSS writer.
